remarks: An eventually bounded function taken to a nonnegative power is eventually bounded.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
statement:
o1cxp.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
o1cxp.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ ( Re ` C ) ) $.
o1cxp.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
o1cxp.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. O(1) ) $.
o1cxp $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B ^c C ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
